TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FocusHomeOrEndHandler(object o, FocusHomeOrEndArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed FocusHomeOrEndHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the FocusHomeOrEndHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the FocusHomeOrEndHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the FocusHomeOrEndHandler is removed from the event.
